title: Smart Home System
description: A mobile app designed to control and monitor smart home devices, offering real-time updates, intuitive UI, and seamless device integration.
challengesFaced: Integrating real-time device data updates across multiple hardware vendors.
Ensuring low-latency communication between the app and IoT devices.
Maintaining a responsive UI across different screen sizes.
futurePlans: Add voice assistant integration (Alexa, Google Assistant).
Introduce energy-saving AI suggestions based on usage patterns.
Enable offline control for certain device functions.

title: Law BD
description: A modern platform connecting users with legal services, case tracking, and lawyer consultations, featuring a clean UI and real-time updates.
challengesFaced: Implementing an efficient real-time case tracking system.
Creating a searchable lawyer directory with multiple filters.

title: WorkSphereX
description: A responsive online marketplace where freelancers can showcase their services, and clients can browse, filter, and hire talent with a secure checkout system.
challengesFaced: Building a scalable filtering system for thousands of services.
Handling secure payments and escrow logic.
Managing user reviews and dispute resolution features.

title: HotelEr
description: A feature-rich hotel booking platform with real-time availability checking, date filtering, and secure user authentication. Designed for speed and mobile-first responsiveness.
challengesFaced: Ensuring booked dates are disabled in real-time without page refresh.
Implementing dynamic price filtering on the server side.
Handling high-traffic concurrency for booking requests.
futurePlans: Enable multi-hotel booking in one checkout.

title: EduManage
description: A comprehensive full-stack e-learning platform offering courses in web development, UI/UX design, and AI. It includes secure authentication, role-based access for instructors and students, course management, and real-time progress tracking with a smooth and engaging learning experience.
challengesFaced: Implementing role-based authentication for admins, instructors, and students.
Managing large datasets for courses and assignments efficiently.
Ensuring real-time updates for student progress and submissions.
futurePlans: Integrate live video classes and chat.
Enable certificate generation upon course completion.

title: CampusPilot
description: CampusPilot is a full-stack student life management app that combines scheduling, budgeting, exam prep, and study planning into a single platform. It includes a unique daily agenda generator blending classes, urgent tasks, and Pomodoro sessions for smarter productivity.
challengesFaced: Designing a flexible weekly calendar system.
Balancing real-time budget updates with performance efficiency.
Ensuring smooth syncing between study planner tasks and class schedules.
futurePlans: Advanced analytics for spending and study patterns Using AI.
Integration with Google Calendar and Microsoft Outlook.
